attributes.action: stop, with immediate effect, the continued use of commerical healthcare companies in providing NHS services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Commercial healthcare companies exist primarily to make a profit for shareholders, not to provide high quality care to UK residents. All of the input from private healthcare into the NHS is costing the taxpayer more money (from increased costs of PFI to the increase of costs with Independent Treatment Centres). Stop privatising the NHS immediately, and spend the vast consultancy fees and additional overheads on frontline NHS services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
